main.name: Rafael Rocha
main.description: I am passioned about using logic to solve problems. Coding is a hobby and a career. Moved from Brazil to beautiful British Columbia in 2014.
main.bio: I love challenges. Moving to Canada was the riskiest but also the best decision I have ever made. I love travelling and practicing sports. Having started (but not finished) a CS Degree in Brazil, I decided to leave the finance world and finally begin my career in the tech industry. Taking a Software Development Bootcamp was a great way to get back on track and freshen up my programming skills. Now I work as a Full Stack Developer and help bootcamp students reach their goals.
